item.title: Research from IDC
item.description: IDC completed 50 years in 2019. The celebration was ceremonious. Incidentally, I re-joined IDC as a PhD student with Prof Girish. I thought of contributing to the celebration by analysing research contributed by IDC to different domains. It started out as an idea during one of my conversations with Prof Anirudha. The post is structured as follows: Why to look at the history of research? Ways to look at the research of an organisation?
